Location: Bellevue, WA       Purpose and Objective:      Concur Technologies, Inc. seeks a Data Scientist at our Bellevue, WA location to identify business use case and data features supporting the creation of machine learning models.    Expectations and Tasks:    Conduct in depth data analysis and utilize programming skills to reshape data for consumption. Provide expertise in machine learning training and performance evaluation. Responsible for building learning system for mapping user generated text into taxonomies used in analytic scenarios. Use combination of information retrieval and ML work to build scalable data scoring systems. Build scalable systems in conjunction with Engineering team. Evaluate new contributions to machine learning and information retrieval domains and provide suggestions on application of new techniques to maximize accuracy and scale. 10% travel required. Education and Qualifications/Skills and Competencies:    Master's degree in Data Science, Mathematics, Statistics or a related field.    Work Experience:    Experience or course work must involve utilizing supervised machine learning in the construction of ensemble classification systems; building models in Python using NumPy, SkiKitLearn, and NLTK; development in Java, Scala, and Python in big data/Spark modeling context; text analytics and natural language processing (NLP); search and information retrieval, including utilizing Lucene, Solr, or Elasticsearch; large data programming; developing scalable machine learning/data classification systems; Platform as a Service technologies including Amazon Web Services, Azure, or Google Compute Platform; utilizing Linux to provision and deploy prototype code and samples to PaaS environments; and Hadoop, Spark, and MapReduce programming frameworks. 10% travel required.    Travel: 10% travel required.       WHAT YOU GET FROM US Success is what you make it.
